Package com.authenticket.authenticket.controller

Class EventOrganiserController

java.lang.Object
com.authenticket.authenticket.service.Utility
com.authenticket.authenticket.controller.EventOrganiserController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins={"${authenticket.frontend-production-url}","${authenticket.frontend-dev-url}","${authenticket.loadbalancer-url}"}, methods={GET,POST,PUT,DELETE}, allowedHeaders={"Authorization","Cache-Control","Content-Type"}, allowCredentials="true") @RequestMapping("/api/v2/event-organiser") public class EventOrganiserController extends Utility
This is the event organiser controller class and the base path for this controller's endpoint is api/v2/event-organiser.

    • findAllEventsByOrganiser

      @GetMapping("/events/{organiserId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GeneralApiResponse<Object>> findAllEventsByOrganiser(@PathVariable("organiserId") Integer organiserId)
      Retrieves a list of events associated with a specific event organizer.
      Parameters:
      organiserId - The ID of the event organizer whose events are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a GeneralApiResponse with a list of Event objects or an error message.

    • updateEventOrganiser

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GeneralApiResponse<Object>> updateEventOrganiser(@RequestParam("organiserId") Integer organiserId, @RequestParam(value="name",required=false) String name, @RequestParam(value="description",required=false) String description, @RequestParam(value="password",required=false) String password)
      Updates an event organizer's information.
      Parameters:
      organiserId - The ID of the event organizer to be updated.
      name - The new name of the event organizer (optional).
      description - The new description of the event organizer (optional).
      password - The new password for the event organizer (optional).
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a GeneralApiResponse with the updated EventOrganiser or an error message.

    • updateOrganiserImage

      @PutMapping("/image") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GeneralApiResponse<Object>> updateOrganiserImage(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, @NonNull @NonNull jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Updates an event organizer's profile image.
      Parameters:
      file - The MultipartFile containing the new image file.
      request - The HttpServletRequest containing the request information.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a GeneralApiResponse with the updated EventOrganiser or an error message.

    • deleteEventOrganiser

      @PutMapping("/delete") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GeneralApiResponse<Object>> deleteEventOrganiser(@RequestParam("organiserId") String organiserIdString)
      Deletes one or more event organizers by their IDs.
      Parameters:
      organiserIdString - A comma-separated string of event organizer IDs to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a GeneralApiResponse with the results of the deletion process or an error message.
